## 2.8 Code Challenge

```{python}
from plotnine import *
import pandas as pd

scalars = np.random.normal(size = 10)
v = np.array([3, 17])

plot_dat = pd.DataFrame()
for sclr in scalars:
    tmp = pd.DataFrame({
        'x': v[0] * sclr,
        'y': v[1] * sclr
    }, index = [0])
    
    plot_dat = pd.concat([plot_dat, tmp], ignore_index = True)

(
    ggplot(plot_dat) +
        aes(x = 'x', y = 'y') + 
        geom_point()
)
```
